name: Endropia III
description:
A Short and goofy little gme that stars the shadow gel cat Babble.

She has to save the moonherd, a gang of people who are friends of the majestic Moonhorse!

This game is not to be taken seriously.  At all.. for that manner.

I made this as a intentional joke, and for fun, PLEASE DO NOT take this as canon to my series or seriously!

Special Thanks to the musical genius Lil' job for the kicking  music!
